semantic_description: Capture the executed stored procedure name as an OpenTelemetry span attribute so it appears in CLM Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: db.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the name of the invoked stored procedure from SqlCommand.CommandText when CommandType is StoredProcedure

attributes_to_add.name: db.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: SqlConnection.Database for the current SQL connection
